title: Chanmongler.zip
description:
This program lets you download entire threads of images from imageboards, such as 4chan. Threads are easily added in your browser by a hotkey, and downloads are started just as easily. You can even search through the entire imageboard for anything you want, and it will list the results. 

In addition, the application can also be used on regular websites. This includes directory listings and any other sites with download links, images, embedded videos... The possibilities are endless.
